briefdescription.para: Define SPI control commands for common usage.
Define SPI control commands for master usage.
Define SPI control commands for slave usage.
Get current device status.

listitem.para: Param usage : store result of current status

briefdescription.para: set the clock mode of spi transfer

listitem.para: Param usage : spi clock mode to choose clock phase and clock polarity

briefdescription.para: set spi data frame size

listitem.para: Return value explanation : If dfs is not supported, then return E_SYS

briefdescription.para: set the dummy data during spi transfer

listitem.para: Param usage : dummy data to transfer

briefdescription.para: Set spi transmit success callback function when all required bytes are transmitted for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transmit success callback function for spi

briefdescription.para: Set spi receive success callback function when all required bytes are received for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : receive success callback function for spi

briefdescription.para: Set spi transfer success callback function when all required transfer are done for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transfer success callback function for spi

briefdescription.para: Set spi transfer error callback function when something error happened for interrupt method.

listitem.para: Param usage : transfer error callback function for spi

briefdescription.para: Set buffer in interrupt transmit, and it will set spi tranfer.

listitem.para: SPI master and slave mode use case For both master and slave mode, if you set tx buffer to NULL, when tx interrupt is enabled and entered into tx interrupt, it will automatically disable the tx interrupt, so when you want to transfer something, you need to set the tx buffer to Non-NULL and enable tx interrupt, when the tx buffer is sent, it will disable the tx interrupt and call tx callback function if available.
Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set xfer to empty

briefdescription.para: Set buffer in interrupt receive, and it will set spi tranfer.

listitem.para: SPI master mode use case Similar to SPI_CMD_SET_TXINT_BUF
SPI slave mode use case Similiar to SPI_CMD_SET_TXINT_BUF
Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set xfer to empty

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable transmit interrupt, for master mode, only one of tx and rx interrupt can be enabled, if tx interrupt is enabled, then rx interrupt can't be enabled.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable receive interrupt, for master mode, only one of tx and rx interrupt can be enabled, if rx interrupt is enabled, then tx interrupt can't be enabled.

listitem.para: Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag

briefdescription.para: start the transfer by polling
start the transfer by interrupt

listitem.para: Param usage : If NULL, it will disable transfer interrupt, if not NULL, it will enable transfer interrupt

briefdescription.para: Abort current interrupt transmit operation if tx interrupt enabled, it will disable transmit interrupt, and set DEV_IN_TX_ABRT in status variable, and call the transmit callback function, when tx callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_TX_ABRT and return.

Abort current interrupt receive operation if rx interrupt enabled, it will disable receive interrupt, and set DEV_IN_TX_ABRT in status variable, and call the receive callback function, when rx callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_TX_ABRT and return.

Abort current interrupt transfer operation if transfer is issued, it will disable transfer interrupt, and set DEV_IN_XFER_ABRT in status variable, and call the transfer callback function, when xfer callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_XFER_ABRT and return.
Do a software reset for SPI device, it will stop current transfer, and clear error state and bring device to normal state, set next condition to STOP.
Flush spi tx fifo, this will clear the data in tx fifo.
Flush spi rx fifo, this will clear the data in rx fifo.
Enable spi device.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Disable spi device, when device is disabled, only SPI_CMD_ENA_DEV, SPI_CMD_DIS_DEV, SPI_CMD_GET_STATUS and SPI_CMD_RESET commands can be executed, other commands will return E_SYS.

listitem.para: Param usage : param is not required

briefdescription.para: Get how many bytes space in spi are available to transmit, this can be used in interrupt callback functions, cooperate with spi_write API to realize non-blocked write.

listitem.para: Param usage : store the write available bytes, > 0 for available bytes, 0 for not available

briefdescription.para: Get how many bytes in spi are available to receive, this can be used in interrupt callback functions, cooperate with spi_read API to realize non-blocked read.

listitem.para: Param usage : store the read available bytes, > 0 for available bytes, 0 for not available

briefdescription.para: select spi slave device

listitem.para: Param usage : the number of spi slave device to select
Return value explanation : return E_SYS when selection can't be done, return E_CTX during transfer

briefdescription.para: de-select spi slave device

listitem.para: Param usage : the number of spi slave device to de-select
Return value explanation : return E_SYS when selection can't be done, return E_CTX during transfer

briefdescription.para: Set spi frequency.
SPI Slave Select Line, start from 0.
Set tx buffer of device spi transfer.
Set rx buffer of device spi transfer.
Calculate total length of current transfer without next transfer.
Set next SPI transfer.
Init spi transfer.
Set extra information pointer of spi info.
Get extra information pointer of spi info.

detaileddescription.para: default dummy value for first open
Inactive state of serial clock is low, serial clock toggles in middle of first data bit
Inactive state of serial clock is low, serial clock toggles at start of first data bit
Inactive state of serial clock is high, serial clock toggles in middle of first data bit
Inactive state of serial clock is high, serial clock toggles at start of first data bit

briefdescription.para: SPI Clock Mode.
SPI Clock Mode.
spi information struct definition

detaileddescription.para: informations about spi open state, working state, frequency, spi registers, working method, interrupt number

briefdescription.para: spi device interface definition

detaileddescription.para:
define spi device interface, like spi information structure, fuctions to get spi info, open/close/control spi, send/receive data by spi
all this details are implemented by user in user porting code

briefdescription.para: get an spi device by spi device id.

detaileddescription.para:
For how to use spi device hal refer to Functions in spi device structure
spi_id
id of spi, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an spi device structure
NULL
failed to find the spi device by spi_id
need to implemented by user in user code get an spi device by spi device id.

briefdescription.para: spi device hardware layer definitions

detaileddescription.para: provide common definitions for spi device, then software developer can develop spi driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
